# zephyr

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/NN-OpenSource/zephyr/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/NN-OpenSource/zephyr/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml)
<!-- badges: end -->

This package is used to filter and enrich data and return a structured object, which can seamlessly be passed to other functionalities to create summaries and in the end tables, figures and listings for clinical trials.

## Functionalities in the package (to do)

The package will have functions that:

-   Wrapper that creates an object with a filtered adsl and other specified adam data

-   Functions to enrich data with information about fx. parameters

-   Wrapper around the above functionalities to create an object with a filtered adsl data, other adam data, information about that data/parameters, etc.

-   Wrapper that "understands" where to look for information as default if given an object that reads from a data base.
